about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a team of professionals passionate about technology
about.storyText: WAI Soft started in 2020, when a team of passionate developers decided to create a company that provides innovative technical solutions. We are an Egyptian company that lives on the cutting-edge of technology focusing on quality and service.

about.visionText: To be the leading technology partner in the region
